name: Genghis Khan 2: Clan of the Gray Wolf
name_original: Genghis Khan 2: Clan of the Gray Wolf
description:
Genghis Khan 2: Clan of the Gray Wolf is a strategy game developed by KOEI. It was originally released in 1993. Koei published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Genghis Khan 2: Clan of the Gray Wolf on PC.
